titles.title: To make residents of Puerto Rico eligible for the earned income tax credit.
Puerto Rico Economic Stimulus Act of 2007
Puerto Rico Economic Stimulus Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Puerto Rico Economic Stimulus Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make residents of Puerto Rico eligible for the earned income tax credit. Phases in the full amount of such credit between 2008 and 2012.
